name: Light in the age of dystopian tale(s)
description: The new face of duality, when we see truth inside us. God constructed everything within, as small as it seems Then put our soul to the layered of skies. Red is a colour of action. It moves us, awakens us, and guides us towards change. It is The color of revolution, movement, and progress. Meanwhile, Blue, as the 5th Chakra, Stimulates the ability to communicate one's most profound truths.
